Plot: An underwater cave diving team experiences a life-threatening crisis during an expedition to the unexplored and least accessible cave system in the world.
Title: Sanctum
Writer: John Garvin, Andrew Wight, Andrew Wight (story)
Actors: Richard Roxburgh, Ioan Gruffudd, Rhys Wakefield, Alice Parkinson
tomatoConsensus: Sanctum is beautifully photographed, and it makes better use of 3-D technology than most, but that doesn't make up for its ham-handed script and lifeless cast.
